subject: Spirit discussion about time
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
A couple days ago while running a h2o session I could hear a spirit asking another "ok how does time go backward" and then last night while recording using drv method it seemes the discussion is still ongoing. I thought a few of you might be interested so I posted them to my esnips.

http://www.esnips.com/web/NewEVPVoices

I also posted this years thanksgiving messages under my files section here on the group. They have continued the tradition again this year.

Happy Thanksgiving!

Misty
